keyPolicies.policyDescription: Government cuts to school funding mean schools are being forced to make choices whether to reduce the curriculum choices or reduce their staffing.

issues.education: Government cuts to school funding mean schools are being forced to make choices whether to reduce the curriculum choices or reduce their staffing.

community.content: A school like mine, which serves a diverse catchment and is one of the largest in the county, offering a broad and rich curriculum is something we are very proud of.

quotes.text: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.

examples: Government cuts to school funding mean schools are being forced to make choices whether to reduce the curriculum choices or reduce their staffing.
We face a future of unprecedented cuts, and it's going to have a devastating effect if we don't act now and change the course of where it is heading.
Teachers like me know that we face heart-breaking decisions that will impact on children in Nottinghamshire and up and down the county.
With dwindling investment Head Teachers and Governors are faced with incredibly difficult decisions.
A school like mine, which serves a diverse catchment and is one of the largest in the county, offering a broad and rich curriculum is something we are very proud of.
Government cuts to school funding mean schools are being forced to make choices whether to reduce the curriculum choices or reduce their staffing.
We face a future of unprecedented cuts, and it's going to have a devastating effect if we don't act now and change the course of where it is heading.

personalStories.story: I've been a Head Teacher in Sherwood for 12 years.

examples: With dwindling investment Head Teachers and Governors are faced with incredibly difficult decisions.
Please don’t let Theresa May lock the doors. I ask you to keep the fire burning and vote Labour on 8 June.

nonPolicyAttributes.employment: I've been a Head Teacher in Sherwood for 12 years.

examples: I've been a Head Teacher in Sherwood for 12 years.
